CustomField.description: Granular turn-level status for internal framework coordination and async job management. Tracks micro-states within a single turn (Processing, Awaiting Action, Awaiting Followup, Idle). Works with CurrentTurnIdentifier__c to prevent race conditions and ensure async jobs don't process stale turns. Changes frequently during turn execution. Not tracked in field history.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Internal turn-level status used by the framework to coordinate async processing and prevent race conditions. Shows the current micro-state within an active turn. Used primarily for framework orchestration rather than user visibility.
CustomField.label: Processing Status
